title: Did South Carolina execute 14-year-old George Steiny, and then declare him innocent after 70 years?
subtitle: The Facebook issue provided an accurate account of the conviction and execution of George Stini Jr. in 1944.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The state of South Carolina executed 14-year-old George Stini in 1944, but a judge from the same court declared him "exculpatory" in 2014.
